tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Shantha mam really cares about her patients .she listened to my symptoms .she gave me clear explanation and allowed me to ask any question I wanted.she is expert in her field.she made me smile and feel relaxed.I would highly recommend her.the staff in the hospital is also very helpful.

All five stars.😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: When I was pregnant in 5months, I have  appendix problem in bursting stage. she did the surgery and save my 5month baby. Before the surgery I was gone to some familiar hospital but they are not assure the baby.  From the surgery to till the delivery she was taking care of us. She is maintaining friendliness till today. If I make a call at any time due to sickness she was giving prescription  over the phone call .  Always she talk in a soft and friendly manner.

Dr. Shantha Rama Rao was very warm and welcoming. I felt really safe during the consultation and check up. She explained me the problem in detail and also gave me useful advice on other non-gynae medicines that can affect gynae issues. As a bonus, she also has blood test and ultrasound facility within the vicinity. I would highly recommend her to everyone, especially for people who prefer a holistic approach to health care. 😄

**** *** * **** **** *** she was very friendly, she checked scan etc everything very patiently. She was very genuine. She guided appropriately and I would definitely recommend this Dr to my friends and family.
I was not satisfied with any Dr,, but with this Dr. I am very much satisfied and happy. She take care of the patients like her own family members.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We found the doctor of our life. We came from a traumatic past with two misses. Those positive words from doctor had given us a belief. She understands the problems deeply and gives every patient an ample time.  Under her care we were blessed with a baby. Super happy with the overall treatment.

review: Doctor was really friendly with my wife and the treatment which my wife took was good  . I went for many clinics past 1yr but this is the best according to me .The doc got many years experience and she knows what best for her patients

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Hello..I consulted Dr.Shantha Rama Rao mam for suggestion and treatment regarding pcod and fibroadenoma. Madam responded quickly by the appointed time and listened to my complaints patiently and had a look on my reports. Then she gave me a good suggestion to approach the concerned person regarding fibroadenoma and gave me courage in a friendly positive way.  so i recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am visiting this place for the first time and I finally felt like I have found a place for getting solutions for all the problems that are related to my PCOS issues. A very soft spoken doctor who attends to all our doubts and issues. She cares like this only for all the consultation. Her sweet words has been very soothing and a guiding light for me. A very great doctor in abstract ❤️

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor was very friendly and she didn’t hurry herself checking on my health like other doctors do, she had all medical equipment’s inside the clinic, it was easy for us to get checked. Doctor was polite in giving medical advice. Doctor was following up on my health condition very often through phone calls and messages and this service was very much appreciated I am very satisfied with the treatment and happy  to recommend this doctor to my family and friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr.Shantha is a true blessing for me. She patiently listened to my condition, took time to analyse reports, explained in detail on treatment options i have, offered guidance on lifestyle changes and diet. A Doctor who remembers your medical history on your next visit and provides hope that any patient needs. We need more doctors like her. I wish her sound health and happiness.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I’m an obese person and I’ve found many doctors quite intimidating. Dr. Shantha was very friendly. I went alone and was quite nervous with a few procedures. Dr. Shantha was very warm and prescribed realistic and achievable diet.She’s very supportive and has an ocean of knowledge. I’d highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Had a wonderful experience with Dr.Shantha mam. Her approach towards patients is very kind and friendly.  She properly and clearly explained me about the health problem I was facing.   Being senior and experienced doctor, I will recommend her to my friends and relatives.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Smt Shantha Ramarao is a very friendly and sincere towards her patients. Iam very happy and blessed to have her medical advice for my problems.. she patiently listened to all my issues and prescribed medications for me.   What was so touching is that she even followed up about my well being..  thanks to her and I strongly recommend her for all mothers

Her approach towards my issue is very genuine .She understood the problem and was explaining on the information on how to resolve it .Her smile makes the wonders i should say .She is very much listening to my words and my problem.Very friendly.Even after the session when i wanted some clarification she was ready to share it through phone and video call.Very much satisfied and comfort i felt when on the consulting hours with doctor .
Doctor patiently listened and took time to see all previous reports and prescriptions. Calm, friendly.
**** ****** **** ******Her lovely words were too impressive ,her patience in all ways shows her as THE BEST DOCTOR ❤️❤️
